post_title: FS: Elite 11 Piedmont 350 Mullin throwing - SOLD
post_content:
Have this Elite 11 Mullin throwing horizontal with the tough Piedmont 350 back. Obvious top pinhole but no real paper loss on the back…..proudly displays the 350…haha

Asking $SOLD obo shipped with tracking, hard to find comps on it. 

Thanks!
Jeff
